text: Miroslav Lajčák (born 20 March 1963) is a Slovak diplomat. He is the Minister of Foreign Affairs. He was the President of the United Nations General Assembly for the 72nd session from September 2017 until his term expired in September 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official curriculum vitae of Lajčák (as of 2012) Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak politicians Category:Ambassadors Category:Presidents of the United Nations General Assembly Category:European diplomats
title: Miroslav Lajčák
